room_title: Escape room "The Curse of the Mummy" by MagIQ Room in Los Angeles
room_address: 1446 S Robertson Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90035
room_description:
One of the most mysterious figures of the Egyptian history is Tutankhamun, who ruled ca. 1332–1323 BC. His – still intact – tomb is located in Luxor, in the Kings’ Valley. Tutankhamun ascended the throne at the age of 9, but he died under unclear circumstances, at the age of 19. His tomb will supposedly reveal the ancient secrets of the pyramid’s construction.
If you find his tomb, not only thousands of treasures hit your grasp, but it would supposedly reveal the thousands of years old secrets of the pyramids’ construction.
